pullrequest.title: review after pull request #46 is done - add sr_hand model

content.raw:
We now have access to sanitized STL files for the APL hand. I'll create a PR for this shortly.

The shadow hand model should live in a separate repository, ideally on github since it would be a ROS package. This change would allow more people to use the shadow hand than just haptix folks.
content.html:
We now have access to sanitized STL files for the APL hand. I'll create a PR for this shortly.

The shadow hand model should live in a separate repository, ideally on github since it would be a ROS package. This change would allow more people to use the shadow hand than just haptix folks.
